name: Bird Paradise
description:
"do you think I'll reach it?" Try your chance at reaching heaven in this short flash style reach-as-far-as-you-can-and-upgrade-yourself game, with the twist that your upgrades die out as you get older.

this game is currently in alpha state. It is playable, but quite buggy and missing the ending cutscene. It's also quite janky but I don't think I have the motivation to fix that.

Controls

Press space briefly to flap your wings or hold it to dive.
Flapping reduces your speed and consecutive flaps are less effective. 

Press shift to use fireball.
